title: Psyche's Weathers
description: Singing about the swirling winds of our lives, Cynthia Atkins maps the uncertainty and ambiguity of human going to rain. Don't you know it's the forecast that is unsure of us-- Looking ahead when we should have been looking behind.The elegant poems of Psyche's Weathers gracefully explore the inner and outer storms that blow through our world.
author: Cynthia  Atkins
